titles.title: Social Security for Adopted Disabled Adult Children Act of 2006
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to exclude benefits of adopted disabled adult children from determinations of the family maximum.
Social Security for Adopted Disabled Adult Children Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Social Security for Adopted Disabled Adult Children Act of 2006 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to exclude the monthly OASDI benefits of adopted disabled children from determinations of the family maximum of OASDI benefits for the month.
